kenticocommunity.qandaanswerdata.QAndAAnswerDataContent:
Your linked images are broken - they look like sharepoint links? Maybe they display for you but I don't think they will for anyone else.
You could try something like https://imgur.com.
What version did you upgrade from? The [Page Builder read-only mode](https://community.kentico.com/blog/xperience-by-kentico-refresh-august-22-2024#page-builder-read-only-mode) was added in v24.0.0. There were some Page Builder script changes and you might be seeing the effects an older cached version of the scripts.
Try clearing your browser cache or removing those scripts from the CDN if you are using one.
